languages.text: {n}Скрипучий голос префекта вклинивается в речь маршала.{/n} "Позвольте уточнить детали! Согласно регламенту, сначала десятину доставляли на Даргонус, а уже отсюда отправляли дальше, в хранилище. Использовались баржи с преимущественно сервиторизированным экипажем, лишь основные офицеры и контингент арбитров сохраняли привилегию автономности... иными словами, расположение системы и планеты строжайше засекречено. {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Навигаторский дом{/g} заключил отдельный пакт... Даже мне не были доверены координаты..."

{n}The raspy voice of the prefect cuts across the Marshal's speech:{/n} "If I may provide certain details: as per regulations, prior to being sent to this temporary depot, all tithe shipments were first brought to Dargonus. These deliveries were made using barges crewed by servitors, with the only people on board with the privilege of autonomous behaviour being key officers and an Arbitrator escort. In other words, the location of both the system and the planet was strictly classified. A special pact was made with the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Navigator House{/g}... Even I was not entrusted with the coordinates..."

languages.text: {n}La voix rauque de la préfète interrompt le discours du maréchal :{/n} « Si je puis me permettre de fournir quelques détails. Conformément à la réglementation, avant d'être transférées dans ce dépôt temporaire, toutes les cargaisons de dîme transitaient d'abord par Dargonus. Ces livraisons étaient opérées par des barges dotées d'équipages de servitors, avec pour seuls individus autonomes à bord une poignée d'officiers et une escorte d'arbitrators. En d'autres termes, les coordonnées du système et de la planète sont strictement confidentielles. La {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}maison des navigateurs{/g} était liée par un pacte spécial, et même à moi, on n'a jamais divulgué ces données... »
languages.original_text: {n}The raspy voice of the prefect cuts across the Marshal's speech:{/n} "If I may provide certain details: as per regulations, prior to being sent to this temporary depot, all tithe shipments were first brought to Dargonus. These deliveries were made using barges crewed by servitors, with the only people on board with the privilege of autonomous behaviour being key officers and an Arbitrator escort. In other words, the location of both the system and the planet was strictly classified. A special pact was made with the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Navigator House{/g}... Even I was not entrusted with the coordinates..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix rauque de la préfète interrompt le discours du maréchal :{/n} « Si je puis me permettre de fournir quelques détails. Conformément à la réglementation, avant d'être transférées dans ce dépôt temporaire, toutes les cargaisons de dîme transitaient d'abord par Dargonus. Ces livraisons étaient opérées par des barges dotées d'équipages de servitors, avec pour seuls individus autonomes à bord une poignée d'officiers et une escorte d'arbitrators. En d'autres termes, les coordonnées du système et de la planète sont strictement confidentielles. La {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}maison des navigateurs{/g} était liée par un pacte spécial, et même à moi, on n'a jamais divulgué ces données... »

languages.text: {n}La voz áspera de la prefecta interrumpe el discurso del Mariscal:{/n} «Permítame proporcionar más detalles: como estipula la normativa, antes de su transporte a este almacén temporal, todos los envíos de diezmo se trajeron a Dargonus. Dichas entregas se realizaron en naves tripuladas por servidores, con los oficiales clave y un Arbitrator escolta como únicos seres autorizados a actuar de forma independiente. Esto significa que la ubicación de tanto el sistema como el planeta era información estrictamente clasificada. Se formó un pacto especial con la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}casa de Navegantes{/g}... Ni siquiera a mí me confiaron las coordenadas...».
languages.original_text: {n}The raspy voice of the prefect cuts across the Marshal's speech:{/n} "If I may provide certain details: as per regulations, prior to being sent to this temporary depot, all tithe shipments were first brought to Dargonus. These deliveries were made using barges crewed by servitors, with the only people on board with the privilege of autonomous behaviour being key officers and an Arbitrator escort. In other words, the location of both the system and the planet was strictly classified. A special pact was made with the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Navigator House{/g}... Even I was not entrusted with the coordinates..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz áspera de la prefecta interrumpe el discurso del Mariscal:{/n} «Permítame proporcionar más detalles: como estipula la normativa, antes de su transporte a este almacén temporal, todos los envíos de diezmo se trajeron a Dargonus. Dichas entregas se realizaron en naves tripuladas por servidores, con los oficiales clave y un Arbitrator escolta como únicos seres autorizados a actuar de forma independiente. Esto significa que la ubicación de tanto el sistema como el planeta era información estrictamente clasificada. Se formó un pacto especial con la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}casa de Navegantes{/g}... Ni siquiera a mí me confiaron las coordenadas...».

languages.text: {n}行政官沙哑的声音打断了元帅的说明。{/n}“请允许我告知您部分相关细节——根据规定，所有什一税在运送到利瑟斯之前，会先转运到达戈努斯。所有货物都由机仆驾驶的驳船进行运输，只有几位重要军官有权享有自主行动能力的特权，由一位法务官负责护卫。也就是说，整个星系与利瑟斯星的位置都是严格保密的。帝国法务部与{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}导航宗族{/g}签订了特殊协议……即便是我，也不了解相关区域的具体坐标……”
languages.original_text: {n}The raspy voice of the prefect cuts across the Marshal's speech:{/n} "If I may provide certain details: as per regulations, prior to being sent to this temporary depot, all tithe shipments were first brought to Dargonus. These deliveries were made using barges crewed by servitors, with the only people on board with the privilege of autonomous behaviour being key officers and an Arbitrator escort. In other words, the location of both the system and the planet was strictly classified. A special pact was made with the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Navigator House{/g}... Even I was not entrusted with the coordinates..."

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官沙哑的声音打断了元帅的说明。{/n}“请允许我告知您部分相关细节——根据规定，所有什一税在运送到利瑟斯之前，会先转运到达戈努斯。所有货物都由机仆驾驶的驳船进行运输，只有几位重要军官有权享有自主行动能力的特权，由一位法务官负责护卫。也就是说，整个星系与利瑟斯星的位置都是严格保密的。帝国法务部与{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}导航宗族{/g}签订了特殊协议……即便是我，也不了解相关区域的具体坐标……”

languages.text: {n}Die raue Stimme der Präfektin schneidet dem Marschall das Wort ab:{/n} "Wenn ich einige Details beisteuern dürfte: Vor dem Transport in dieses temporäre Depot wurde der gesamte Zehnt gemäß den Bestimmungen nach Dargonus gebracht. Diese Lieferungen erfolgten mittels von Servitoren gesteuerter Lastschiffe. Die einzigen Personen an Bord mit dem Privileg autonomen Verhaltens waren leitende Offiziere und eine Eskorte von Arbitratoren. Mit anderen Worten: System und Planet unterlagen höchster Geheimhaltung. Mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Navigatorenhaus{/g} wurde ein spezieller Pakt geschlossen ... Nicht einmal ich kannte die Koordinaten ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The raspy voice of the prefect cuts across the Marshal's speech:{/n} "If I may provide certain details: as per regulations, prior to being sent to this temporary depot, all tithe shipments were first brought to Dargonus. These deliveries were made using barges crewed by servitors, with the only people on board with the privilege of autonomous behaviour being key officers and an Arbitrator escort. In other words, the location of both the system and the planet was strictly classified. A special pact was made with the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Navigator House{/g}... Even I was not entrusted with the coordinates..."

Die einzigen Personen an Bord mit dem Privileg autonomen Verhaltens waren leitende Offiziere und eine Eskorte von Arbitratoren. Mit anderen Worten: System und Planet unterlagen höchster Geheimhaltung. Mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Navigatorenhaus{/g} wurde ein spezieller Pakt geschlossen ... Nicht einmal ich kannte die Koordinaten ..."

languages.text: {n}総監のガラガラ声が将帥のスピーチを遮る。{/n}「もっと詳細な話をしましょう！租税貨物はすべて、この一時保管場所に送られる前にまずダルゴナスに持ってこられました。こうした配達はサーヴィターが乗組員を務める荷船で行われ、アービトレイターのエスコート付きで重要な士官である思慮深い人だけが乗っていた―別の言い方をすれば、システムと惑星の両方の場所は厳重な機密情報であったのです。特別な盟約が{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}航宙士の家{/g}と結ばれました…私でさえその座標を知らなかったのです…」
languages.original_text: {n}The raspy voice of the prefect cuts across the Marshal's speech:{/n} "If I may provide certain details: as per regulations, prior to being sent to this temporary depot, all tithe shipments were first brought to Dargonus. These deliveries were made using barges crewed by servitors, with the only people on board with the privilege of autonomous behaviour being key officers and an Arbitrator escort. In other words, the location of both the system and the planet was strictly classified. A special pact was made with the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Navigator House{/g}... Even I was not entrusted with the coordinates..."

languages.text: {n}Prefektin hırıltılı sesi, Miralay'ın sözünü kesiyor.{/n} "İzninizle belirli ayrıntıları paylaşmak isterim! Yönetmelikler uyarınca bu geçici depoya gönderilmeden önce tüm aşar sevkiyatları, ilk olarak Dargonus'a getirilirdi. Bu teslimatlar, mürettebatın hizmetörlerden oluşturduğu mavnalarla yapılırdı. Mavnalarda, otonom davranış sergileme ayrıcalığına sahip bir tek önemli subaylar ile bir refakatçi Yargıcı olurdu. Bir diğer deyişle, hem sistemin hem de gezegenin konumu kesinlikle gizli tutuluyordu. {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Rotacı Hanesi{/g} ile özel bir anlaşma yapılmıştı. Koordinatlar bende bile mevcut değildi."
languages.original_text: {n}The raspy voice of the prefect cuts across the Marshal's speech:{/n} "If I may provide certain details: as per regulations, prior to being sent to this temporary depot, all tithe shipments were first brought to Dargonus. These deliveries were made using barges crewed by servitors, with the only people on board with the privilege of autonomous behaviour being key officers and an Arbitrator escort. In other words, the location of both the system and the planet was strictly classified. A special pact was made with the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobiliteGlossary}Navigator House{/g}... Even I was not entrusted with the coordinates..."
